channel.title: Git on 风笑天的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Git on 风笑天的博客

item.title: git环境搭建
item.description: 1.download a tarball 下载最新版本git 1 wget https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/git-2.9.5.tar.xz 2.解压 1 tar -xvf git-2.9.5.tar.xz 3.configure 1 2 cd git-2.9.5 ./configure 4.make and make install 1 make && make install 5.测试 打印出版本号代表安装成功； 1 2 git version git version 2.9.5 problems ​ ①fatal error: zlib.h: No such file or directory 1 2 yum search zlib yum install zlib-devel -y ​ ②Can’t locate ExtUtils/MakeMaker.
